text: Shop keeper needs to clarify the 20 cents extra charge for cashless payment? If so charged, why is it not stated explicitly about the extra charge beside the displayed QR code?
Owner charged an additional $0.20 for a $1 item when I used cashless payment. Scolded him, and requested that he return the $0.20. Dishonest and ridiculous practice.
Stuff sold are a lot pricier than anywhere else. Additional 20 cents will be charged for paying via the QR code (do note because they won't tell you and it's not written in black and white).
Cashier wanted to charge us $39.50 for a carton of 6 Sapporo beer  when 1 can is selling at $4.9. Dishonest.
It’s so funny that I have to add an extra 20 cents to pay by scanning the QR code. It’s really embarrassing for you.
